Package me.agno.gridjavacore.columns

Interface IColumn<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of data in the column
All Known Subinterfaces:
IFilterableColumn<T>, IGridColumn<T>, ISortableColumn<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridCoreColumn
public interface IColumn<T>
Represents a column in a grid.

      Returns the name of the column.

      Returns the field name of the column.
      Returns:
      the field name of the column

    • getTargetType

      Class<?> getTargetType()
      Retrieves the target type of the IColumn instance. The target type defines the data type that the column represents.
      Returns:
      the target type of the IColumn instance

    • setFieldName

      void setFieldName(String fieldName)
      Sets the field name of the column.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name to set

    • sum

      IGridColumn<T> sum(boolean enabled)
      Calculates the sum of the column.
      Parameters:
      enabled - a boolean value indicating whether the sum calculation should be enabled
      Returns:
      the instance of the column for method chaining

    • average

      IGridColumn<T> average(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the calculation of the average value of the column.
      Parameters:
      enabled - a boolean value indicating whether the average calculation should be enabled
      Returns:
      the instance of the column for method chaining

      IGridColumn<T> max(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the calculation of the maximum value of the column.
      Parameters:
      enabled - a boolean value indicating whether the maximum calculation should be enabled
      Returns:
      the instance of the column for method chaining

    • calculate

      IGridColumn<T> calculate(String name, Function<IGridColumnCollection<T>,Object> calculation)
      Enables or disables a custom calculation of the column.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the calculated column
      calculation - the calculation function for the calculated column
      Returns:
      the added grid column

    • min

      IGridColumn<T> min(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the calculation of the minimum value of the column.
      Parameters:
      enabled - a boolean value indicating whether the minimum calculation should be enabled
      Returns:
      the instance of the column for method chaining

      the instance of the column for method chaining

    • setPrimaryKey

      IGridColumn<T> setPrimaryKey(boolean enabled, boolean autoGenerated)
      Sets whether the column is a primary key column and whether it is auto-generated.
      Parameters:
      enabled - a boolean value indicating whether the column is a primary key column
      autoGenerated - a boolean value indicating whether the column is auto-generated
      Returns:
      the instance of the column for method chaining
